t: Definition: Amazon FreeTime Unlimited | Amazon & Marketplace SOPs
s: FreeTime Unlimited is an all-in-one subscription that gives kids access to thousands of kid-friendly books, movies, TV shows, educational apps, Audible books, and games on compatible Fire, Fire TV, Android, iOS and Kindle devices.
